                                                Class<T> requiredType)
        Description copied from interface: AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Searches the ApplicationContext of the specific module for a bean of the given type. Returns an empty optional if no unique bean could be found.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • getBeansOfType

        public <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass)
        Description copied from interface: AcrossContextBeanRegistry

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. This includes beans from ancestors, but does not include module internal beans.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Specified by:
        getBeansOfType in interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfTypeAsMap

        public <T> Map<String,T> getBeansOfTypeAsMap(Class<T> beanClass)
        Description copied from interface: AcrossContextBeanRegistry

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. This includes beans from ancestors, but does not include module internal beans.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Beans will be returned as a Map where the key is the bean name.

        Specified by:
        getBeansOfTypeAsMap in interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        Map of bean instances with their bean name and/or module information.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfType

        public <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass,
                                  boolean includeModuleInternals)
        Description copied from interface: AcrossContextBeanRegistry

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Specified by:
        getBeansOfType in interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfTypeAsMap

        public <T> Map<String,T> getBeansOfTypeAsMap(Class<T> beanClass,
                                             boolean includeModuleInternals)
        Description copied from interface: AcrossContextBeanRegistry

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Beans will be returned as a Map where the key is the bean name if module internals are not included or the bean is from a parent context. If module internals are included, the bean name will be prefixed with module name.

        Specified by:
        getBeansOfTypeAsMap in interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        Map of bean instances with their bean name and/or module information.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfType

        public <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(org.springframework.core.ResolvableType resolvableType,
                                  boolean includeModuleInternals)
        Description copied from interface: AcrossContextBeanRegistry

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        This method allows looking for beans having specific generic parameters.

        Specified by:
        getBeansOfType in interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        resolvableType - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfTypeAsMap

        public <T> Map<String,T> getBeansOfTypeAsMap(@NonNull
                                             @NonNull org.springframework.core.ResolvableType resolvableType,
                                             boolean includeModuleInternals)
        Description copied from interface: AcrossContextBeanRegistry

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        This method allows looking for beans having specific generic parameters.

        Beans will be returned as a Map where the key is the bean name if module internals are not included or the bean is from a parent context. If module internals are included, the bean name will be prefixed with module name.

        Specified by:
        getBeansOfTypeAsMap in interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        resolvableType - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        Map of bean instances with their bean name and/or module information.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getContextInfo

        public ConfigurableAcrossContextInfo getContextInfo()
        Specified by:
        getContextInfo in interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
        Returns:
        the entire context info
